mapper.select: SELECT hubo_id AS huboId, name, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(birthday, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y.%m.%d') AS birthday, jd_name as jdName, hanja_name AS hanjaName, giho, image FROM candidate c WHERE 1=1 AND sg_id = '20200415' AND sg_type_code = '2' AND sgg_name = #{sggName} ORDER BY giho

SELECT sd_name AS sdName, sg_id AS sgId, addr AS addr, emd_name AS emdName, ev_order AS evOrder, CASE pre_yn WHEN '0' THEN ev_ps_name WHEN '1' THEN ps_name END AS evPsName, floor AS floor, place_name AS placeName, ps_name AS psName, wiw_name AS gusigunName FROM poll_place WHERE sg_id='20200415' AND pre_yn = '0' AND sd_name = #{sdName} AND wiw_name = #{gusigunName}
